12.「村王にも そう伝えたから| そっちの方に行けば| きっと ふたりに 会えるはず: I've told the village king that, and I'm sure|you'll find them there!

13.「ラギ雪原は ランガーオ山地の東端から| 北へ抜けた所にある 厳しい雪原だ。|: Ragi Snowfield is a harsh snowfield just north|of the eastern edge of the Langao Mountains.|If you go there, take this with you.

15.「それは 雪山で体力をうばわれぬよう| 身体を あたためるための 薬草の一種だ。: It is a kind of medicinal herb that warms the|body so that it does not lose its strength in|snowy mountains.

33.「……目を覚ませ クーガ。| どうやら 神さまは まだ| わしらを 死なせてくれ: Wake up, Cougar. Apparently, God hasn't let us|die yet.

34.「いかんな……。寒さで 意識を| 失ってしまっている。何か 身体を| あたためる: I don't like it... I'm losing consciousness|from the cold. I wish I had something to warm|me up...

35.村王クリフゲーンに|ヌーク草を 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Would you give Warm Herb to Chief Cliffgain,|the Village King?<yesno><close>

37.<pc>は 村王クリフゲーンに|ヌーク草を 渡した。: <pc> gave Warm Herb to Chief|Cliffgain, the village king.

38.「おお ヌーク草を持ってきてくれたか！| よし！ これさえあれば！: Oh, you brought Warm Herb! Yes! If only I had|some of this!

42.「さすが 効果絶大だな。| よし わしも ひとクチいただこう。: As expected, it is very effective. All right,|I'll have a mouthful, too.

43.「いやあ ありがとうございました。| おかげで 血が沸き立つくらい| 全身ポカポ: Well, thank you very much. Thanks to you, my|whole body is so warm that my blood boils.|With this, I can make it back to the village!

46.「ヌーク草も持たずに 雪山に来るとは| わしも うかつだったわ。| いや それよ: It was stupid of me to come to the snowy|mountains without Warm Herb. No, it was more|like...

47.「この わしが 雪山で動けなくなる日が| 来るとはな……。: I never thought the day would come when I|would be stuck in the snowy mountains...
